A bare bones Foundation & Jekyll boilerplate to get up and running fast.

download v.1.5.0

created by aaronkwhite

About

This boilerplate was created as a starting point to use Foundation & Jekyll to create static websites. There aren't many (if any) Foundation & Jekyll boilerplates, so I created one. The structure is geared more towards building static sites, not just a blog. Hopefully you'll find it as useful as I do.
